features: Soothing Facial Toner: This is a soothing turmeric dark spot corrector toner that is designed to improve the texture and appearance of your skin. It is suitable for both women and men.

Hydrates and nourishes skin: This toner helps to hydrate and nourish your skin, leaving it feeling refreshed and revitalized. It can also help to reduce the appearance of pores. They also gently exfoliate to reveal a more radiant look.

All Natural Ingredients: Turmeric Toner helps even out skin tone, increases radiance, and leaves the complexion looking more youthful. Together all-natural ingredients provide a gentle yet effective way to achieve radiant, healthy-looking skin.

Versatile Usage: For best results, use regularly. This facial mist can be used as a toner after cleansing or throughout the day as a refreshing and hydrating spray for the skin. To use, close your eyes and spray the mist onto your face and neck.

Try it risk-free: Buy with confidence. We always believe that you should pay for with you are satisfied with. Please contact us if you have any questions about the product, and we will reply to you as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm really loving this toner. It feels great on my face, it's light, fresh smelling, and hydrating.I was expecting this to smell like tumeric but it doesn't, it has a very light smell and it's airy.This has helped with light redness on my face and helped soothe my skin as well. It also hydrates my skin a lot but doesn't make it super oily like some toners tend to do to me.I really like this toner, it settles into my skin nicely and feels good and makes my skin look and feel better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice, simple toner. The fragrance is subtle, like a combination of rosewater and a very light citrus. The ingredients are overall quite gentle and the texture is smooth and provides good hydration.The one area where I have mixed feelings is regarding how it’s advertised as a turmeric toner. While turmeric is relatively high on the ingredients list, coming in at 6th, there’s no way to know at what concentration. So more than likely, the majority of hydration is coming from the first 5 ingredients. That’s not to say that the turmeric is insignificant, there’s just no way to know for sure.Lastly, Amvital seems to be a solid company. They have declarations on their website about sustainable practices, lack of GMOs and rigorous quality testing. However, there’s no proof of those claims. As a consumer who’s new to the brand, it would be very meaningful if they actually published this data rather than just mention it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This sprays a very light and dispersed solution on your face. I initially found it odd that you must spray it on, as you have to close your eyes to avoid spraying into them, but with a few uses, I have found it to be very easy. Because the spray is so fine and light, it is easy to control and it dries very quickly. I actually think it helps with some of the redness in my face, but I cannot be certain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight refreshing spray
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with the fact that this is in a spray. It’s lightweight, refreshing spray it’s no oily feel. I feel it’s brightens my skin and is so easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice hydrating and refreshing spray toner
reviews.reviewText: This turmeric spray toner is very watery and light. It is extremely refreshing - it has a wonderful, herbal smell. Initially, I thought it had cloves in it because it’s scent reminds me of cloves, but there’s no cloves in here. This did not leave my skin feeling sticky or greasy, and it absorbed quickly into my skin. It’s very hydrating, and just a really nice moisturizing toner with turmeric in it. Turmeric has great skin care, benefits, and I have never seen one before in a spray toner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing Spray! Nice Light Scent!
reviews.reviewText: Current price $9.99. Nice in-expensive toner. Love that it is a spray bottle. I found the spray really refreshing. The scent was very light. My face was initially a bit tacky until the spray dried. Once dried, my skin felt soft and moisturized. 4 Stars. Hope you find this review and picture helpful. I am very surprised by the quality at such a low price point. I would order this toner again! Toner doesn't need to be expensive to be good!
